block.createnuclear.reactor_input.toolti: _The Reactor Input_ is a _block_ that can be used to insert _Uranium_ and _Graphene_ rods into the _Reactor_
Insert _unranium_ and _graphene_ rods in large quantities to power _the reactor_
block.createnuclear.reactor_controller.t: The _Reactor Controller_ is the _most important_ block for operating the reactor
it handles all the calculations needed to _generate energy_, it need a _reactor blueprint_ with a patern to work
block.createnuclear.reactor_output.toolt: _The Reactor Output_ is a _block_ that can be used to extract the mechanical energy generated by the _Reactor_
You can _extract the energy_ produce by the reactor by attaching _shaft_ to the _reactor output_
